meanings.definition: To take part in or experience something
meanings.sent1: She partaken in the school play last year.
meanings.sent2: They partaken in the delicious feast together.
meanings.sent3: He partaken in the dance-off with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The students partaken in the knowledge like sponges.
meanings.sent5: The adventurer partaken in the thrill of the unknown journey.

meanings.sent1: The siblings partaken the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent2: Friends often partaken their secrets with each other.
meanings.sent3: The team partaken the victory celebration with joy.
meanings.sent4: The community partaken the responsibility of keeping the park clean.
meanings.sent5: The neighbors partaken the beauty of the blooming garden.
